dt: {bc}something (such as a long-handled cup) used for {a_link|dipping}

{bc}any of a genus ({it}Cinclus{/it} and especially {it}C. cinclus{/it} of the Old World and {it}C. mexicanus{/it} of North America) of birds that comprise an oscine family (Cinclidae) and include individuals that wade and dive into swift mountain streams in search of food
{bc}a group of stars that resembles a dipper: such as

shortdef: something (such as a long-handled cup) used for dipping

dt: {bc}to obtain money from two sources at the same time or by two separate accounting methods

dt.t: Apparently, preferred shareholders get to {wi}double-dip{/wi}. During the liquidation of the company, they get their money back first. Then they split the rest on a pro rata basis with us lowly common-stock holders.

dt: {bc}to draw a pension from one government department while working for another
{bc}to repeat the action of dipping a chip or other snack into a shared dipping sauce or mixture after taking a bite

dt.t: But bring up nachos and suddenly everyone wants a place at the same table, the nacho table of peace—at least until someone tries to {wi}double-dip{/wi}.
Everybody seems to {wi}double-dip{/wi} at cocktail parties. Should I be concerned about the germs they leave behind?

utxt.t: Keegan was an academy graduate who had put in his thirty and retired to become a {wi}double-dipper{/wi}. In uniform, he'd been an intelligence specialist, and now he had essentially the same job, which added civil service salary to his pension.
An unabashed {wi}double-dipper{/wi}, he's that rare neatnik who doesn't fear germs.
Most of the trusts are overseen by plaintiff lawyers … Can they be counted on to weed out {wi}double-dipping{/wi} and false claims?

{wi}Double-dipping{/wi} is gross, but it's unclear how bad it is for your health. One study did show there are more bacteria in the salsa after someone dunks twice, but they're the kind that normally live in our mouth and are pretty innocuous.

shortdef: to obtain money from two sources at the same time or by two separate accounting methods; especially : to draw a pension from one government department while working for another
to repeat the action of dipping a chip or other snack into a shared dipping sauce or mixture after taking a bite

dt: {bc}the seven principal stars in Ursa Minor

shortdef: the seven principal stars in Ursa Minor
